they that pant<WH7602> after the dust<WH6083> of the earth<WH776> on the head<WH7218> of the poor<WH1800>, and turn aside<WH5186> the way<WH1870> of the meek<WH6035>: and a man<WH376> and his father<WH1> go<WH3212> unto the same maiden<WH5291>, to profane<WH2490> my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034>:
